languages.text: The wearer moves in a straight line deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage and pushes a target 3 cells away in the end of the path. This ability does not count toward the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use Bull Charge.

traits.locale_text: The wearer moves in a straight line deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage and pushes a target 3 cells away in the end of the path. This ability does not count toward the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use Bull Charge.

languages.text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

This ability does not count toward the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use Bull Charge.

There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.

The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

languages.text:
使用者が直線に移動し、進路上のすべてのターゲットに対して動いて、{uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc}ダメージを与えて、ターゲットを3セルに{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}吹き飛ばす{/g}。この攻撃はファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}1ターンあたりの攻撃回数{/g}制限にはカウントされない。
ターゲットと使用者の間に何もないセルが2つ以上必要。
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が直線に移動し、進路上のすべてのターゲットに対して動いて、{uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc}ダメージを与えて、ターゲットを3セルに{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}吹き飛ばす{/g}。この攻撃はファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}1ターンあたりの攻撃回数{/g}制限にはカウントされない。
ターゲットと使用者の間に何もないセルが2つ以上必要。

languages.text:
L'utilisateur se déplace en ligne droite en direction de sa cible et inflige {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} dégâts, puis {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} la cible de 3 cases. Cette capacité n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g}.
Il doit y avoir au moins 2 cases libres entre l'utilisateur et sa cible pour que cette capacité puisse être utilisée.
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur se déplace en ligne droite en direction de sa cible et inflige {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} dégâts, puis {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} la cible de 3 cases. Cette capacité n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g}.
Il doit y avoir au moins 2 cases libres entre l'utilisateur et sa cible pour que cette capacité puisse être utilisée.

languages.text:
El portador se mueve en línea recta hacia el objetivo, le inflige {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} de daño y lo {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a 3 casillas de distancia. Esta capacidad no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g}.
Debe haber por lo menos 2 casillas libres entre el guerrero y su objetivo para poder usar esta capacidad.
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
El portador se mueve en línea recta hacia el objetivo, le inflige {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} de daño y lo {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a 3 casillas de distancia. Esta capacidad no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g}.
Debe haber por lo menos 2 casillas libres entre el guerrero y su objetivo para poder usar esta capacidad.

languages.text:
装备者沿直线向目标移动，对目标造成{uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc}点伤害，同时将其{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}3格。此能力不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击次数{/g}。
装备者与目标之间必须至少隔着两个空格子，才能使用此能力。
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
装备者沿直线向目标移动，对目标造成{uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc}点伤害，同时将其{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}3格。此能力不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击次数{/g}。
装备者与目标之间必须至少隔着两个空格子，才能使用此能力。

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, düz bir çizgide hedefe doğru ilerler ve {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} hasar verir, ardından hedefi 3 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}. Bu kabiliyet, {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz.
Bu kabiliyeti kullanabilmek için, giyen kişi ile hedef arasında en az 2 boş hücre bulunması gerekir.
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
Giyen kişi, düz bir çizgide hedefe doğru ilerler ve {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} hasar verir, ardından hedefi 3 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}. Bu kabiliyet, {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz.
Bu kabiliyeti kullanabilmek için, giyen kişi ile hedef arasında en az 2 boş hücre bulunması gerekir.

languages.text:
Der Träger nähert sich dem Ziel in einer geraden Linie und verursacht {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} Schaden, ehe er das Ziel 3 Felder {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückwirft{/g}. Diese Fähigkeit fließt nicht in das Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe pro Zug{/g} ein.
Für den Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit müssen zwischen dem Träger und dem Ziel mindestens 2 freie Felder sein.
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger nähert sich dem Ziel in einer geraden Linie und verursacht {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} Schaden, ehe er das Ziel 3 Felder {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückwirft{/g}. Diese Fähigkeit fließt nicht in das Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe pro Zug{/g} ein.
Für den Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit müssen zwischen dem Träger und dem Ziel mindestens 2 freie Felder sein.

languages.text:
Персонаж движется по прямой линии к цели, наносит ей {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} урона, а затем {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} ее на 3 клетки. Эта способность не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}.
Чтобы использовать способность, персонаж должен быть хотя бы в 2 клетках от цели.
languages.original_text:
The wearer moves in a straight line to the target and deals {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} damage, then {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 3 cells away. This ability does not count towards the limit of the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.
There must be at least 2 free cells between the wearer and the target to use this ability.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж движется по прямой линии к цели, наносит ей {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} урона, а затем {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} ее на 3 клетки. Эта способность не расходует запас {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, которые может совершить персонаж.
Чтобы использовать способность, персонаж должен быть хотя бы в 2 клетках от цели.

Персонаж движется по прямой линии к цели, наносит ей {uip|Damage|d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc} урона, а затем {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} ее на 3 клетки. Эта способность не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}.
Чтобы использовать способность, персонаж должен быть хотя бы в 2 клетках от цели.
